creator: thomas@wyona.com
text:
Canonical Links to default language docs are not rewritten after renaming. 

(default lang = de)

 - before -> after
 - before.html -> after.html
 - before_de.html -> before_de.html
 - before_en.html -> after_en.html

This is because the linkRewrite task is using the DocumentBuilder which is
building document uris without language suffixes for default language docs.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Would you mind providing a unit test? TIA!

More than 3 years with no activity. 

Reopen this bug if your are still facing this.
creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
